name: Conspiracies of the Heart
summary: You're a tough-talking, quick-witted community officer committed to protecting others, but what happens when the roles get reversed? After a bizarre chain of events kicks off leading to your parents' disappearance, three enigmatic men waltz into your life, eager to avenge you. As you stumble across strange conspiracies and salvage phantom memories, it’s clear those closest to you have a past they're unwilling to reveal. At the end of the day, who can your heart really trust?
